channel.title: Need (Another) Bingo
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need (Another) Bingo"

item.title: Re: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded: Looks good! Thanks Lear, pleasure doing business with you (if you can call it that).

item.title: Re: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded: Thanks much. I've received anonymous, and I just bingo'd you in return. Let me know if there was some problem. There shouldn't be, but if there is, let me know.

item.title: Re: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded:
Yep! Just wanted to make sure I could fulfill my end. I am the above Anon user and the deed is done, if I some how screwed it up let me know but don't think I did.

As for the other bits, I'm Kedoch from Viking Village. Hope you enjoy having Anon!

item.title: Re: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded:
Yes, I do still need a Bingo.

However, for me to bingo you, I need a name and a village a.) because I need to make sure my village has a spy in yours, and b.) so that if someone else bingo's me before you can, I don't note page him back.

So just post your name and village here, and as soon as I see that I've been bingo'd, I'll send you a bingo back. (I've plenty of apples to make a Cure Right Wounds.)

item.title: Re: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded:
Lear, if you still need to be bingo'd I can do it some time today or tomorrow after the roll, assuming the spy I just infiltrated doesn't get spotted (almost failed that! 7/7 successes!)

Assuming you do need to be bingo'd still, and assuming I can get it done in a reasonable time for you, after the deed is done I'd like to ask to be bingo'd in return.

item.title: Need (Another) Bingo
item.content:encoded:
Alright, so I'm season 2 now, and I need bingo'd for Anonymous.

I am of course willing to bingo someone in return, if they wish.

Post here before bingoing to a.) let everyone else know not to bingo me and b.) confirm whether or not you want a bingo in return.

If you decide to be a jerk and either not post here or bingo me sans note page, you WILL be hit from me (sans note page, of course)â€¦. possibly more than once.

By the way, I'm a level 45 Sp. Jonin from none other than the Wiki Village.
